\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.field.prefix}
\label{configuration:DatabaseFieldPrefix}
\ClearAPI
The prefix for a database field to be recognized as the corresponding database part for a property in an entity. E.g. the prefix is "PREFIX\_" and the java property is "field1" the database field "PREFIX\_FIELD1" would automatically be recognized as the counterpart to the java property.

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.DatabaseFieldPrefix}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.field.prefix}}]
database.field.prefix=PREFIX_
\end{lstlisting}
